item.dc:creator: FSgt. Balzer [Ret.]
item.description:
29TH INFANTRY DIVISION
116TH REGIMENT, 1ST BN
OFFICE of the Lt. Col via
CHARLIE CO. HEADQUARTERS




WARNING ORDER (WARNO)

OPERATION SLINGSHOT
23 January 2021, 1600 EST

Situation
The security situation in Takistan has been deteriorating for several months. OPFOR separatists have gained ground, escalating attacks on BLUFOR bases supporting the central government. At the central government’s request, BLUFOR is launching Operation Slingshot, an offensive aimed at completing three key OPFOR objectives in Takistan.

Objectives:

  • Objective 1: Secure/Defend Training Camp [008,104].
  • Objective 2: Capture/Defend HVT [025,050].
  • Objective 3: Destroy/Defend Weapons Cache [108,063].

Map

  • Takistan [MAP OF AO TBD]

Mission

  • BLUFOR is tasked with completing three (3) OPFOR objectives.
  • OPFOR is tasked with defending three (3) objectives from BLUFOR.
  • Scenario Time Limit: 2 Hours.

Win Conditions

  • BLUFOR must secure all three objectives to win.
  • OPFOR must hold at least one objective to win.

Forces

  • BLUFOR
  • OPFOR (GRNFOR-type kit)

BLUFOR Equipment
Kits provided.

  • Any M4/M16 variant.
  • Any faction-correct 1x optic.
  • Any OCP vest/backpack as appropriate.
  • MARPAT optional if under 2MRB command.
  • Cosmetic customization only. DO NOT change kit composition.
  • Diffusal kits.

Assets:

  • 1x M1220 (O-GPK/M2) MRAP
  • 2x 1151A1 (GPK/M2) Humvee
  • 3x M1025A1 Humvee (unarmed)
  • 3x M1078A1P2 Transport Truck (unarmed)
  • MH-6M “Little Bird”

OPFOR Equipment:

  • Kits provided (slotting as RED, but using GRNFOR-type equipment).
  • Any AK47/AKM/N variant.
  • Any faction-correct 1x optic. Any GRNFOR vest/backpack as appropriate.
  • Cosmetic customization only. DO NOT change kit composition.
  • IEDs (# TBD)/Cell phones.

Assets:

  • Strongholds and Hideouts (see Scenario Parameters for more information)
  • 1x Offroad [Technical] (HMG) per stronghold
  • 1x UAZ 3151 (DshkM) per stronghold
  • 1x UAZ 3151 (SPG-9) per stronghold
  • Any civilian vehicle (unarmed)

Scenario Parameters

  • OPFOR Strongholds and Hideouts:
  • Strongholds: Main bases, motor pools.
  • Hideouts: Teleport poles close to objectives for moving infantry quickly.
  • Only OPFOR knows the locations.
  • Stronghold and hideout locations will be revealed to OPFOR command on the day of the event.
  • Unlimited respawns: Must be deployed in a group of at least four (4) soldiers.
  • Timed vehicle respawns: Armed vehicles take longer than unarmed vehicles to respawn.
  • Some members of the 29th may be assigned to 2MRB command in the interest of scenario balance.
  • Each side will have 1x Medic.

Rules of Engagement
BLUFOR

  • Free to fire on armed individuals, commander’s discretion.
  • PID targets
  • DO NOT fire on civilian vehicles without PID.
  • Avoid civilian casualties.
  • Civilian vehicles are off-limits.
  • Buildings may be entered to clear or garrison as needed.

OPFOR

  • No restrictions, except…
  • No vehicle-mounted IEDs.

Skills Focus

  • Asymmetrical warfare.
  • Operational coordination in a large AO.

item.title: Charlie Operations ArmA 3: 2MRB PvP Event - Saturday, June 27th.
item.dc:creator: SSgt. Dott
item.description:
Charlie Company will be hosting an event on the Arma 3 Company server on Saturday, June 27th, at 1700 EDT (2100 UTC). We are pleased to invite our friends, and frequent collaborators, the 2nd Marine Raider Battalion (2MRB) to this multiple round PvP event.

Company server modset: CBA, 29thID, Rosche, Isla Abramia, Anizay, Ruha, Kunjari, Pulau, CUP Terrains Core, CUP Terrains Maps, TFAR, ACE3, Grad Trenches, ACE:Cmpt RHS RU, ACE:Cmpt RHS GN, ACE:Cmpt RHS US, RHS RU, RHS GN, RHS SAF, RHS US and STUI

29th ID Arma 3 Steam Workshop Collection: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1133996579

Please arrive early so the event may begin on schedule.

Charlie Company

29th Infantry Division

June 27th, 2020

Operation "Showdown"

WARNO

Teams

CDF (Blufor) (to be assigned at start)
ChDKZ (Grnfor) (to be assigned at start)

Equipment

CDF (15% Strength Advantage):
Faction Correct Kits
2x BTR-60
Transports (Various)

ChDKZ:
Faction Correct Kits
1x UAZ [DShK]
Tripod mounted weapons

See Kitting Section below for more details.

Background:

October, 2009. Chernarus is currently embroiled in a bloody civil war. The ChDKZ (Chernarussian Movement of the Red Star) has managed to eject the CDF (Chernarussian Defence Forces) from the South Zagoria region. However, things have turned around for the government forces, thanks in large part to the United States joining the conflict, and they are now on the offensive. The CDF aims to push ChDKZ from two strategic areas today: The factory/train yard located in the city of Chernogorsk, and a BM-21 rocket site being used by the ChDKZ.

Scenario:

October 9th, 2009. 0715 Hours.

Round 1: Attack/Defense - 45 Minutes
Objective: Hold factory capture zone at end of time limit OR eliminate other team.

Round 2: Attack/Defense - 45 Minutes
CDF Objective: Destroy all three BM-21 rocket launchers present in the area of the rocket site.
ChDKZ Objective: Prevent destruction of BM-21 rocket launchers.

Kitting Guidelines:

  • Stock kits will be provided for attendees: Rifleman and Specialist Classes (Leadership, Machinegunner, Grenadier, Anti-Tank, Explosive Specialist).
  • Kit modification is not allowed for this event.
  • More than 1x/team specialist class assignments will be made depending on numbers.
  • NVGs will not be required for this op.

Miscellaneous:

  • Teams to be decided.
  • Each round will be preceded by a planning period (~10 minutes)
  • ChDKZ (Grnfor) is free to move during this planning period.
  • ChDKZ (Grnfor) may not approach the CDF (Blufor) starting area.
  • BM-21 Rocket Launchers may only be destroyed via demolition blocks.

item.description:
iNation Guidance Corp
Charlovi Battalion
WARNO
Operation Exodus Angel 		 

WARNO


1). Situation:

NATO forces have illegally encroached on Chenarus sovereignty. The Chenarus Provisional Government(provisional iNation member), have asked for protection. Civilians in Elektrozavodsk are being herded on ships and are being forcibly relocated. With NATO air assets neutralized by our defenses, we are preparing a armored push to the coast to protect the civilian population of Elektrozavodsk. Charlovi Battalion is tasked with supporting this move.

2). Mission:

iNation Armored armored forces will be moving south from Mogilevka towards Elektrozavodsk. Our armor is being prepped just south west of Mogilevka for an attack that should be ready in the next few days. Move south and clear the path for our armor. A local militia Checkpoint has been spotted near 098,107. The militia force has placed anti tank mines on the roadway on or near the Checkpoint. Local militia forces are known to be hostile to both iNation and NATO forces. Charlovi Battalion is tasked with capturing and clearing the mines at or neat the checkpoint. It is also expected NATO forces will be moving North to stop or slow our advance. Destroy the mines at check point. Also, NATO forces are preparing anti armor positions north of Elektrozavodsk. Destroy these positions.

  • 1). Take and hold the Checkpoint at 098,107
  • 2). Defend our armor assets near 082,104
  • 3). Destroy anti armor assets at or near 102,123


3). General Instructions.

A). Organization/Command:

Charlovi Battalion in over all command of Opfor

. Weapons and Equipment:

Unlimited 5.56/5.45 faction specific rifles with standard optics (ACOG/RCO or less)
2X faction correct MGs
2X Medics
1X Faction correct Single Shot AT launcher (RsH-26)
1X Faction correct Multi Launcher 4 rounds total
2X GLs - 3 rd GLs are banned
2X 7.62 Rifle with standard optics (ACOG/RCO or less)
1X Sniper/marksman

  • No Thermals - None, no gun optics with thermals or binoc thermals.
  • 2 Silencers for Opfor.
  • No guided Launchers.
  • Range finders with night vision for Squad Leaders and above ONLY.
  • All others may have binocs.
  • NVGs are allowed.
  • Satchel Explosives are allowed (6 total).
  • Reasonable and realistic kit, ammo, loadouts,etc.

D). Intelligence:

Hostile Forces:

Local Militia Forces are known to be hostile to both iNation and NATO forces. They blame both for the conflict in Chenarus. Made up of retired Armed forces of Chenarus members, local police and other paramilitary groups, they are assumed to be small in numbers and loosely organized. Lightly armed with Soviet era equipment, this small force should be considered competent and motivated.

NATO forces recently encountered were of the 2nd MRB, supported by elements of Bravo Company. This is a US Marine Recon force equipped with first rate US Kit.

item.title: Operation Atavist ~The Story So Far~
item.dc:creator: FSgt. Balzer [Ret.]
item.description:
Operation Atavist



As the political situation in the eastern european country of Vasaria worsens, the local government has requested NATO intervention. Rebels have seized large portions of the country and the NATO friendly government seems on the verge of collapse. The UN Security Council has been unable to do more than to demand hostilities in Vesaria to cease. Russian and China have both blocked a proposal to send in a NATO peace keeping force, claiming it as a would destabilize the situation more than it already is.

The Vasaria Freedom Party(VFP) is an enigma, its origins and funding are a not clear. Its xenophobic and nationalistic propaganda are extreme, yet also at odds with the multinational make up of its armed fighters. A mixture of captured government equipment and modern military tech of Russian, Chinese, North Korean and Iranian origin are unexplained. Only the North Korean government has made any statements of support for the rebel movement. Western intelligence agencies claim this rebel movement is being funded by multiple terrorist organizations and foreign Intelligence agencies. The VFP's speed, organization and ruthlessness have been surprising. No photos or video of the groups leader exist, even the leaders true name is unknown. Reports of Russian military "advisers" have not been confirmed on the ground, and have been denied by the Russia's ambassador to the U.N. What has been confirmed are multiple mass killings and other atrocities that are U.S. and British Intelligence say they confirm through satellite intelligence.

With NATO unable to assist directly with lethal aid, the government is begging the international community for help. While western nations seek peace talks, there has been no response from the rebels. The situation seems to be getting worse. Western intelligence agencies deny supplying lethal aid to the government, stating only humanitarian aid has been approved by all western governments. Reports of western PMC's such as the 25th ARAIG in Vasaria's Capital only seem to make the situation more complex. A PMC unit as large and as well equipped as the 25th could greatly improve the government's situation on the ground. The Vasarian Defense Minister Jan Kubek denied the 25th ARAIG had been hired by his government. Maj. Brown and 1st Lt. Jones of the 25th ARAIG command team have been photographed coming and going from the defense ministry. A convoy containing the bulk of the 25th ARAIG has allegedly been spotted moving north from the capital east towards the Vasarian province of Bystrica.

Bystrica, last of the eastern provinces not in rebel hands, was seized last month in a lightning campaign by the Charlovi Battalion. The unit was a loyal government formation, which marched out of barracks last month to join the rebellion. In recent years the Charlovi Battalion was deployed to the middle east in a combat role with NATO. This was part of a NATO training and review program. The program was to train and evaluate Vasaria and its military, for NATO membership. It is alleged that the Charlovi Battalion was ordered to Barracks, after refusing to act against local rebels. Soon after the Charlovi Battalion seized a local radio station, broadcast accusations of crimes and atrocities by the Vasarian Government. When the rogue unit seized Bystrica, government units fled after reports of the units efficiency and brutality.

What is this?

Operation Atavist for Arma3 will be a on going single life(realism),elite(first person only), TvT event. The Charlie Company of the 29th Infantry Division is working with the 25th ARAIG to create this regular event. An event which is story driven, with goals, rewards and consequences. Units will take turns on OpFor and Bluefor for 3 month rotation. The rotation will give enough time for units to take part in complex multi-mission operations. While at the same time taking turns as liberating forces and brutal forces of repression. Charlie Company of the 29th ID will start as a brutal rebel force,the Charlovi Battalion, while the 25th ARAIG begins Operation Atavist as a PMC hired to free lands seized by the Charlovi Battalion. While Units will be playing "baddies" on Opfor and "heros" on Bluefor, scenarios will be designed to create a balanced fight where units can put their training to test. 29th Members wish your Battalion mates good luck for their first outing in Operation Atavist. Arma3 thrives on events like these, now lets see what happens when the 29th teams up with the 25th ARAIG.
